@oliverturner @Netlify You don't need to mess with the API Gateway, that is sorted for you. Each function will be reachable on a URL determined by it's file name under /.netlify/functions (the admin app will show you each function's endpoint) The docs talk about that here: https://t.co/e895xPpAGx
